alert.note: Alert for Coconino; Navajo (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 17 at 11:28PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MST/1 PM MDT/ SATURDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by rain and snowmelt continues. * WHERE...Little Colorado River near Bird Springs. * WHEN...Until noon MST Saturday /100 PM MDT Saturday/. * IMPACTS...Flooding of the Little Colorado River near Bird Springs, including the approaches to the bridge along Navajo Route 71, is expected. Deadly flooding over low-water crossings along the Little Colorado River. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1123 PM MST /1223 AM MDT/, gauge reports indicated high water in the area. Flooding is ongoing along the river south of Bird Springs. - This includes the following creeks, washes and rivers... Little Colorado River. Flooding is occurring along the Little Colorado River. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Navajo Reservation. - Visit www.weather.gov/safety/flood for more information on flood safety.
info.instruction: Stay away or be swept away! The banks of creeks and washes are unstable and unsafe during any flooding event.
